hero.title:
Suvaii
A Pandyan Legacy
Authentic Tamil Cuisine
hero.subtitle: Experience the rich culinary heritage of the Pandyan dynasty in every bite.

about.title: A Culinary Journey Through Time
about.paragraph1: At Suvaii, we invite you to embark on a culinary adventure, exploring the authentic flavors of the Pandyan dynasty.  Our dishes are crafted with passion and precision, using traditional recipes passed down through generations. We are committed to preserving the rich culinary heritage of Tamil Nadu and sharing it with the world.
about.paragraph2: From aromatic spices to fresh, locally sourced ingredients, every element of our cuisine is carefully selected to create an unforgettable dining experience.  Join us and discover the true taste of Tamil Pandyan legacy.
